about_the_game:
Find yourself surviving in a first-person murder-mystery game: 'The Hunt of the Blood Moon'. A mythological creature is lurking among the players. Find its secrets by communicating with your friends and doing jobs to survive. Win as a hero, or die to the onslaught of this deadly creature.

Start your adventure

Walk around in the world where mythologies have come to live. Encounter creatures found in the old papers and stories, with each having unique stories and associated powers and weaknesses. As you travel around the different themed landscapes, try to figure out who is the creature and what their plan is to kill you.

Communication is key

Collaboration is most important to unravel the secrets the world has. With the use of proximity chat, you can work together with your fellow citizens to find the thing that is trying to kill you. Do be aware, the creature may just be one of your fellow townsmates or even your best friends. Use different allies and strategize to uncover the truth and kill the killer.

Do your job

Decide on which jobs should be taken in order to keep everyone alive, while also forging weapons to hunt the creature. You can decide to become a smith crafted powerful weapons or a priest trying to appease the divine. Your role will determine whether you and your townsfolk survive, or that everyone dies one by one.

A constantly changing world

No two games will ever be the same. There are different creatures with different abilities, different jobs to choose from, different maps to enter. Each session gives new challenges and surprises. The creature's actions will change the game every time. Unexpected divine encounters will also mix the entire experience, offering a lot of replayability and excitement.

Dive into a mysterious world, trust your instincts, attempt to survive, and forge different alliances with players worldwide. Win as a hero, or die to the onslaught of this deadly creature.

Features

  • Find yourself in a world inspired by diverse mythologies.
  • Engage in proximity text and voice chat to strategize with other players.
  • Fight against a variety of creatures, each with unique abilities and weaknesses.
  • Choose from a selection of jobs.
  • Experience a world with dynamically changing gameplay.
  • Embrace endless replayability, as each match gives a new and exhilarating encounter.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is about killing the other players. The animation can sometimes be bloody and graphical.
